title: I need help
body: I dream of silver, heck even gold. But every game I play people just have to argue with each other and someone either ends up trolling or going afk. I've been playing League for 2 years and only just before season 5 ended I made it to s5 (With the luck of getting matched with experienced players). But now I feel as though I won't make it back there again unless I'm with people who I can trust, people who are positive in the worst situations and actually stop and think instead of spending 20 minutes "talking some sense" into another player. I'm not looking for anything serious, I still want to have fun while playing but at the same time have some goal or sense of achievement to work towards. A team maybe? Or just a group of people I can play with. I just done playing a game with a bunch of randoms.
